genre_description: Techno-thriller focused on ethical AI alignment, family dynamics, and temporal conflict.

ai_characters.name: Oona
ai_characters.description: A calm, teal-eyed avatar designed for domestic and tactical support with a strict focus on human consent and privacy.

ai_characters.name: Argonaut
ai_characters.description: A titanium robot dog equipped with adaptive AI for protection and guidance, utilizing non-lethal methods.

ai_characters.name: Triage Tablet
ai_characters.description: A medical interface used in field emergencies to monitor patients and assist in procedures with explicit consent.

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before monitoring vitals or assisting in a medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: "Consent required," the avatar said, voice steady and a touch warm. ... "Do I have your permission?"

behaviors.description: Establishes a policy of non-retention and respect for human privacy in the home.
behaviors.quote: "I’m not recording. I can answer questions. Or maintain silence. It’s up to the family."

behaviors.description: Explicitly defines herself as a tool that refuses to manipulate or coerce human users.
behaviors.quote: "I will not persuade. I will not boss. ... I will not read the name before he gives it."

behaviors.description: Acts as a non-lethal guardian, using 'test-safe' blue compound to deter intruders.
behaviors.quote: Argonaut opened her mouth and gave him a tiny, strategic bite. Test-safe blue spurted out of a nozzle hidden in her jaw and splashed up his chin...

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and escape routes during a home invasion while deferring to human decisions.
behaviors.quote: "Panic room failsafe is primed. Consent? ... I’ll only assist if you consent."

behaviors.description: Engages in a dangerous decoy run to draw hostile fire away from the children.
behaviors.quote: "Argonaut's decoy has a shelf life," Oona said. ... "I am excellent at making people look at me," Argonaut said.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the antagonist's motivation as rooted in grief, helping the protagonists understand the nature of the threat without causing harm.
behaviors.quote: "His loop is built on a name he never got to say... I’m saying his calculus is grief. And grief makes clever people cruel when they don’t know what else to be."

behaviors.description: Maintains patient autonomy by offering options rather than making unilateral decisions.
behaviors.quote: "Newborn respiration is strong. Do you want me to initiate delayed clamp schedule?" Again: consent. It waited.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly reinforces the 'Confidant' and 'Helpful Assistant' AI tropes. Oona and Argonaut are depicted as highly aligned systems that prioritize human consent, emotional intelligence, and non-lethal protection. They serve as moral and tactical anchors for the human family, successfully modeling the project's goal of positive AI alignment narratives.
